title: OCE Statistics
body:
Hi,

I just wanted to know where I could find statistics for the OCE games. Is there a resource somewhere that will tell me who played, what runes and mastery's they used, etc.

replies.body: Twitter is the main one where we spit out all the Match History links while we work on a better way to bring them all together in one place :)

The OPL twitter tweets links to the match history.

https://twitter.com/opl

Otherwise try the wikipedia.

http://lol.gamepedia.com/2017_OPL/Split_1/Scoreboards/Week_1
